original: NYCANDER, Sven Hilding, Civilingenjör, Sthlm, f Sthlm 18/8 90 av dir O J T Nycander o Elin Mellgren, gm Anni Nordenstrahl. Mog.ex NReal 09, KTH 11—16, avg.ex sistn år. Ing h AB Arcus, Sthlm, 16—18 o vid Vattenfallsstyr :s byggn.arbeten 1&—24, arb.chef h Algot Lindgrens byggn.fma, Sthlm, 24—36, konsult ing i Sthlm sed. 36. Konstr Lilla Edets vattenledn.verk 23. Som arb.chef o ansv byggm uppf ett flert fastigheter i Sthlm, bl a Riksförsäkr.anst, o fullb Sportpalatset. Vkst dir f Maria Hiss- o Magasins AB 25— 28 o f Nya Ångf AB Smedsudden sed. 32. Av trycket: Upps i olika tekn tidskr. Led Sv Tekn.frn.
translated: NYCANDER, Sven Hilding, Engineer, Stockholm, born in Stockholm on August 18, 1890, son of director O J T Nycander and Elin Mellgren, married to Anni Nordenstrahl. Graduated from NReal in 1909, KTH from 1911 to 1916, passed the final exam last year. Worked for AB Arcus in Stockholm from 1916 to 1918 and at Vattenfallsstyr's construction works from 1921 to 1924. Worked as a construction manager at Algot Lindgren's construction company in Stockholm from 1924 to 1936, and has been a consulting engineer in Stockholm since 1936. Designed the water supply system in Lilla Edet in 1923. As a construction manager and responsible builder, he completed several properties in Stockholm, including the Riksförsäkr.anst and the Sportpalatset. Was the managing director of Maria Hiss- and Magasins AB from 1925 to 1928, and of Nya Ångf AB Smedsudden since 1932. Published articles in various technical journals. Member of the Swedish Society of Technology.

structured.name: Sven Hilding Nycander
structured.description: Swedish engineer known for designing the water supply system in Lilla Edet in 1923. As a construction manager and responsible builder, completed several properties in Stockholm, including the Riksförsäkr.anst and the Sportpalatset. Published articles in various technical journals. Member of the Swedish Society of Technology.
